name: Word Blitz - Multiplayer Search Puzzle Game
name_original: Word Blitz - Multiplayer Search Puzzle Game
description:
Can you handle the Word Blitz challenge?

Test out your word game skills! Compete against players from around the word for real money & cash prizes!

The most popular Word Game in the app store!
- Score points by rapidly making words (the longer the better)
- Quick! You only have 2 minutes to beat your opponent
- Get on Fire! Many fun and exciting power ups to play
- Play for fun, or compete for real cash money!
